display_long_description:
## **Welcome to the Skies: Where Flow, Focus, and Speed Collide**

Your hands turn into wings in this fast-paced speedrunning VR game. Take to the skies and see how fast you can go! Fly through 30 handcrafted tracks at breakneck speeds reaching 300 mph. The closer you fly to the ground, the faster you go -- but don't crash! 

[media]

Easy to learn but difficult to master, this game will challenge you to prove yourself the best surfer in the sky. Can you handle the speed and reach the finish line, mere centimeters away from crashing catastrophically?



🪽 **Surf the Skies** – Glide through narrow tracks and feel your speed surge as you fly dangerously to terrain.

🎯 **Pure Skill** – Mastery comes from precision and timing. How good can you become?

👻 **Race Your Ghost** – Compete against your best time and refine your path run after run.

🌍 **Online Leaderboards** – Post your scores and see how you rank against players and friends.

💨 **Intense Sessions** – Perfect for quick flights or long sessions chasing perfection.

Find your rhythm. Chase perfection. Become an **Ace of the Air** in *Aerosurfer*!

[media]
